byline.original: By CHRIS BUCKLEY and AUSTIN RAMZY
byline.contributor: Chris Buckley reported from Katmandu, and Austin Ramzy from Hong Kong.

lead_paragraph: The government has established 16 large camps in Katmandu, but many residents accuse officials of incompetence, neglect or even corruption.

headline.print_headline: Frustration Grows in Nepal as Earthquake Relief Trickles In
headline.main: Frustration Grows in Nepal as Earthquake Relief Trickles In

snippet: The government has established 16 large camps in Katmandu, but many residents accuse officials of incompetence, neglect or even corruption.
